sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About the Contest Platform

This platform is built to enhance your problem-solving skills by participating in various coding contests. It offers two types of contests:

  • Weekly Contests: Solve problems with a 6-day submission window.
  • Bi-Daily Contests: Engage in intense 2-hour problem-solving challenges.

Unique Feature: To unlock a problem statement, solve an engaging riddle first!

Track your performance through leaderboards and history, and don't miss out on fun quizzes held on special occasions. This platform is perfect for competitive programmers looking to sharpen their skills.

How to Use the Platform?

  1. Register or login to access contests.
  2. Participate in contests by solving riddles to unlock problems.
  3. Submit your solutions and climb the leaderboard.
  4. View past performances and improve your ranking.

Join us and be part of a growing community of coders ready to take on new challenges!

); }; export default About;
